timeline.message: Support for Vert.x rx-java async tasks
Use Vert.x route for server span name
Move reactive Vert.x instrumentation into separate module

timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyText: for better or worse(?), instrumentation typically catches Throwable
timeline.author: trask
trask

timeline.bodyText: we should start propagating the Context instead of propagating (only) the parent Span, but this applies to lots of places, I'll open an issue for it
